alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 27 at 9:18PM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...In Iowa, Sioux, O`Brien and Clay Counties. In South Dakota, Turner and Lincoln Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Saturday. The heaviest snow should be from about 2 AM to 10 AM. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
